label: abyssallink
name: Abyssal Link
description: Teleport spells from the spellbook no longer require runes, but award no magic XP.

label: berserkersfury
name: Berserkers Fury
description: Deal up to +5.5% damage (all styles) the lower your current life points are below max. (Doesn't stack with Dharok's set effect.)

label: blessingofhet
name: Blessing of Het
description: Food and potions heal 10% more lifepoints.

label: conservationofenergy
name: Conservation of Energy
description: After using an ultimate ability, you will regain 10% adrenaline.

label: deathnote
name: Death Note
description: All guaranteed bone and ash drops are noted.

label: deathward
name: Death Ward
description: 5% damage reduction when your life points are below 50%; 10% damage reduction when they are below 25%.

label: flowstate
name: Flow State
description: 20% increase to Archaeology excavation precision at the expense of receiving no soil

label: furyofthesmall
name: Fury of the Small
description: All adrenaline generating basic abilities generate +1% adrenaline.

label: luckofthedwarves
name: Luck of the Dwarves
description: You will always gain the effect of tier 4 luck.

label: persistentrage
name: Persistent Rage
description: Your adrenaline now generates outside of combat at a rate of 5% every 1.2 seconds, instead of having it drained.

label: shadowsgrace
name: Shadows Grace
description: Reduces the cooldown of Surge, Escape, Bladed Dive, Dive and Barge by 50%, but these abilities no longer generate adrenaline.

label: slayerintrospection
name: Slayer Introspection
description: When requesting a new slayer assignment, you will have a choice between the minimum and maximum assignment amounts.

label: stickyfingers
name: Sticky Fingers
description: The player will automatically attempt to pickpocket at a 50% faster rate after a successful attempt until they are caught.
